title: Why do I get sad when I draw or write? - Quora

response.answer_text: My personal theory is due to self reflection while drawing/writing. Explore what you are feeling. Is it due to the nature of your work at the moment? Human creation is emotion transformed into something other ; art, written or spoken words, work projects etcetera. Self assessment of thoughts/emotions is necessary to fully understand one’s own actions/reactions/emotions.
Because you are empathetic and your art or words connects you to emotion?
